text: A te, kotoryye uverovali, pereselilis' v Medinu i srazhalis' na puti Allakha, i te, kotoryye dali im priyut i podderzhali ikh, Istinu Allakha i Yego veru - oni i yest' iskrenniye veruyushchiye. Allakh Vsevyshniy ikh proshchayet, i dlya nikh budet bol'shoy udel v blizhayshey zhizni i v budushchey
